text: "It's less about who you are and more about what you choose to do."  ~@kimber_lockhart of @onemedical http://t.co/4bFZQGxes9 #empowering

"Entrepreneurs don't answer a question succinctly, but question the question itself." ~@sorayadarabi of @Zady http://t.co/Szxslncmqp

"I'd advise my 22 year old self to read more fiction, and to remember that it all works out" ~@sorayadarabi of @Zady http://t.co/Szxslncmqp
